summary.en-US: Minimalist website clipper to be consumed by your favorite RSS reader. It provides a context-menu entry to send the website URL to your influss instance.

description.en-US: Minimalist website clipper to be consumed by your favorite RSS reader. It provides a few means to clip a website and send it to your influss instance. It will provide a context-menu entry as well as a page action item. The influss endpoint, username and password can be configured in the extensions settings.
